creator: claes.randstrom@nssmb.com
text:
Negative numbers are shifted slightly towards the left
when displayed within a table cell. That is, negative
numbers appear unaligned when presented in a column
together with positive numbers.

This was not the case in V 0.13 of FOP.

I can't find any shifting, whether the text is aligned left or right.
The report is much to sparse to make anything out of it.
creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
